instructions: Log in to the T-Mobile app or My T-Mobile . (App only) Tap SHOP , and then tap Add a line . (My T-Mobile only) Click Add a person or device to my account in the I want to " section. Select Buy a new phone . Click Continue . Select your device. Select your color, memory variant, and pricing option, and click Add to cart . Click Yes, I want to trade in a device if you would like to trade in a device. Otherwise, click No thanks, continue to cart . Enter the trade-in device information (dial *#06# to get your phone's IMEI, or find it in phone settings ), then click Continue . Click Trade in this phone . Click Yes, protect my phone , or click No, I ll take my chances to opt-out of insurance. Confirm your order details and pricing, then click Continue to Shipping . Select your shipping method and review the address section. Edit the address if necessary, then click Continue to payment . Enter your payment details and click the Customer Agreement box to confirm consent of the T-Mobile Terms and Conditions Click Place order . Sign your EIP (Equipment Installment Plan) agreement if you are financing your device with T-Mobile. Click Submit order .

Log in to the T-Mobile app or My T-Mobile . (App only) Tap SHOP , and then tap Add a line . (My T-Mobile only) Click Add a person or device to my account in the I want to " section. Select Use my own phone . Select Continue . Confirm your order details and pricing, then select Continue to Shipping . Select your shipping method and review the address section. Edit the address if necessary, then select Continue to payment . Enter your payment details and click on the Customer Agreement box to confirm consent of the T-Mobile Terms and Conditions. Select Place order .
